name: Destruction (itch) (FlapJack)
description:
・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

INTRODUCTION:

Welcome to Destruction. FlapJackk Studios are proud to present our very first game!  This game is currently in demo, so if there are bugs/glitches please report them to our discord server - Click Me!.

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

GAMEPLAY:  You're a character which we will call Steve for example. Steve goes through 24 unique levels trying to defeat every boss and enemy that comes his way.  He has 2 weapons a machine gun and a pistol. The pistol does more damage to begin with, but in the long run the machine gun does more damage. You collect potions and use the potions to upgrade your weapons inside the game shop! 

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

ENEMIES:  There are currently 7+ unique enemies you can fight. These enemies will do anything in their power to defeat  you and try to stop you. Don't let them defeat you!

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

SETTINGS:  The game itself is maximized Windowed mode. Which means it cannot be moved until it is reduced in size using the Restore Button. The main resolution of the game is 1920x1080.

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

CONTROLS: 1 - First Gun 2 - Second Gun  'A' and 'D' - move left and right Space - Jump LMB(Left Mouse Button) - Shoot

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

CREDITS: Graphics, Game Design, Art:  Discord - FlapJackk#3525

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

EXTRA: Hope you enjoy the game will be looking forward to working with new people and advance this game. Good luck and don't die!
